mapper.select: select r.rid, e.eid, m.uid, m.email, m.name, m.role, m.thumbnail from room r join entrant e on r.rid = e.rid right join member m on e.uid = m.uid where r.rid = #{rid};

select r.rid, m.uid,m.name, r.room_name, ev.vid, ev.eval_date, ev.attention, ev.participation, ev.distracted, ev.asleep, ev.afk, ev.start_time, ev.end_time from room r join entrant e on r.rid = e.rid right join evaluation ev on e.eid = ev.eid left join member m on e.uid = m.uid where r.rid = #{rid};
